On Windows, double-click the folder in File Explorer to open it and then right-click and select "New Text Document" before renaming it to `calculator.py`.

        update_readout()           # Update the readout with the new value

def clear_entry():
    global result_value  # Make result_value a global variable so that it can be accessed by other functions

```

root.mainloop()
```

```
